mapper.insert: insert into student(st_grade, st_class, st_num, st_name) values(#{std.grade}, #{std.classNum}, #{std.num}, #{std.name})
mapper.update: update student set st_grade = #{new.grade}, st_class = #{new.classNum}, st_num = #{new.num}, st_name = #{new.name} where st_grade = #{old.grade} and st_class = #{old.classNum} and st_num = #{old.num}
